Mary Ukaego Odili (née Nzenwa ; CFR  Onye amuru na 12 n'ime onwa Mee 1952) bu onye okaikpe Naijiria na nwunye Peter Odili, onye jere ozi dika Gọvanọ Rivers Steeti site n'aro 1999 rue 2007
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi okikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Nigeria (JSC) ma bụrụ onye isi ọkaikpe Katsina-Alu nyere ya iyi ọrụ na 23 na onwa June 2011.

Tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi okikpe nke SCN, o nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ dị mkpa ọrụ, gụnyere Onyeikpe, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Rivers Steeti (1992-2004), ụlọ ikpe nke ukwu, ụlọ ikpe mkpehari, nkewa Abuja (2004-2010), na ulo ikpe ziri ezi, ụlọ ikpe mkpehari, nkewa Kaduna
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka nwunye mbụ nke Rivers steeti n'oge di ya bụ gọvanọ.
